paragraphs.text: I hear you; this is what I figured. Stuff spirals so easily in public settings. I’m glad we’re rallying now, and busting out with our own stuff. Reclaiming Medium! Yes please. 😊

bc7b64daf909.title: Wow, I literally stopped in my tracks when I saw this painting (or rather, print of a painting, I’m…

paragraphs.text: Wow, I literally stopped in my tracks when I saw this painting (or rather, print of a painting, I’m assuming) at an antique mall this weekend. I looked all over for an artist’s name and couldn’t find one. I kind of feel like we’re connected by the universe. :)
paragraphs.name: 4c94

content.subtitle: (But yes ignoring my woo-woo waves bit, I totally know what you’re talking about. 😊)

virtuals.subtitle: (But yes ignoring my woo-woo waves bit, I totally know what you’re talking about. 😊)

paragraphs.text: Apt Medium!!! I think there’s something to that, tho, for real. It happens a lot to me on Facebook, where I’ll be quietly obsessing over something and then three friends will post about that exact thing. My…suspicion? is that the better we get to know each other, the more closely our ‘waves’ line up. Omg stop typing. Shhhh.
paragraphs.name: d3f2

paragraphs.text: Excellent.
paragraphs.name: d9d1
